name: Raveyard
description:
Story

You are a world-famous witch and you brew powerful potions. Sadly, you've perished from the mortal realm; you have been executed and are now in Hell. But you don't have the time to be dead. You've got places to be and potions to brew. But the ghosts won't make it easy for you to escape!, so kill all of them and send them to.. double hell?

Gameplay

Top-Down Gameplay. Ghost come at you in waves with one goal in mind: Stop you from escaping the afterlife. Shoot them down and beat all waves to finish the game

Content

  • 19+ handcrafted waves of enemies
  • 5 Different enemy types
  • 3 Different enemy power-ups
  • 3 Potions
  • a really sick adaptive soundtrack

Controls

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • LMB - Aim and Shoot
  • Q, E, F - Use a potion

Note: Fire and Posion Potions only fired once shot with LMB

Spooky 2D Jam

This game was made for the Spooky 2D Jam 2020 hosted by Theo Clarke. The theme for this jam was "Escape!". The time limit was 48 hours (or 49 hours?). This is a solo entry
